name: Spyre Infostructure
overview:
Spyre Infostructure Inc., headquartered in Toronto, Canada, was established in 1995 and specializes in providing Internet-based e-business solutions for the tourism industry with a focus on the lodging sector, including; Hotel organizations, car rental, cruises, airlines, and tour and travel operators.

Spyre Infostructure Inc. is a privately held, Canadian Corporation specializing in Internet e-business based technology and subscription-based (rentable) software applications. Spyre’s focus is to provide turnkey technology solutions and consulting services for the travel and tourism industry to allow organizations to manage their own hotel reservations system, as well as electronic communications, marketing, sales, and distribution.
